description: With 1,800 schools, and more than 1 million students, New York City’s reopening plans include random temperature checks, a nurse in every building and a 14-day quarantine for anyone who tests positive for the virus.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump fuels baseless birther theory about Kamala Harris
description: President Trump didn’t knock down a racist conspiracy that Sen. Kamala Harris isn’t eligible to be vice president. Harris was born in California, and is legally qualified to run for president or vice president.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: U.S. Postal Service warns mail-in ballots may be too late
description: The U.S. Postal Service sent out an urgent warning, writing letters to 46 states and Washington, D.C., saying it can’t guarantee all ballots cast by mail will arrive in time to be counted.
source.name: NBC News

author: Isoke Samuel
title: Old footage of a Vietnam vet surprises his family when it goes viral
description: A video went viral earlier this summer featuring a Black man stationed overseas during the Vietnam War, talking about the racism he faced.

source.name: NBC News

author: Associated Press
title: High school football to resume in Florida over the advice from doctors
description: The Florida High School Athletic Association board voted to begin practices on Aug. 24 with games less than two weeks later.
content: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. Floridas high school athletic board voted Friday to begin practices for football and other fall sports Aug. 24 and games less than two weeks later, pushing aside the advice of i… [+2598 chars]
